description: Miso paste gives this stir fry fantastic umami flavour.
name: Beef & Miso Mushroom Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g sirloin steak, trimmed and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a large wok over a medium heat, heat the oils and add the mushrooms. Cook for 5 minutes until browned.
Whisk together the miso, soy sauce and two tablespoons of water in a medium bowl, tip in the mushrooms and kale, mix and set aside.
Place the wok on a high heat and add the steak strips, flash frying for 1 minute, tossing occasionally. Add the mushroom mix and the spring onions to the wok and cook for 1 minute, stirring.
Add the rice noodles and cook for 1 minute until heated through, adding a splash of water if necessary. Divide between four plates and serve immediately.
